item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Ashley Tisdale - Walmart Soundcheck EP (Lossless rip?)
item.description:
Hi everybody,
All of the sudden, Walmart Soundcheck EP appeared on streaming platforms/qobuz/itunes/etc
And

Is there a chance someone can rip that EP in lossless quality?
I know lossless version can be purchased on Qobuz but maybe someone with the subscription can rip it off Qobuz/Deezer/Apple Music or whatever service that offers lossless streaming quality (if there's still a way to do that)
Thank you!
item.author: disneyrussianmusic

item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - V.A. - Take It Easy - 15 Soft Rock Anthems (2006)
item.description:
Various Artists - Take It Easy - 15 Soft Rock Anthems

Padrão: FLAC(Faixas) + Cue + Log + Scans (PNG 300dpi)
Total de Faixas: 15
Tempo Total: 00:52:44
Tamanho Total: 413MB
Selo: Q Magazine
Catálogo: QSOFTROCKSEP06
Lançamento: 2006
Procedência: Internet (Giulio Benevides, direto da Suécia)

Tracks:
01. A Glass Of Champagne - Sailor
02. (Don't Fear) The Reaper - Heaven 17
03. Now She Knows She's Wrong - Jellyfish
04. Yesterday Once More - Redd Kross
05. Don't Believe A Word - Def Leppard
06. A Dream Goes On Forever - Todd Rundgren
07. The Afternoon - The Moody Blues
08. Queen Of The Hours - Electric Light Orchestra
09. A Horse With No Name - Larrikin Love
10. Up The Junction - Chris Difford
11. Everybody's Got To Learn Sometime (Acoustic Version) - The Korgis
12. It's Too Late - James Morrison
13. Wherewithal - Clifford T Ward
14. Year Of The Cat - Psapp
15. Fly Now - Brian Protheroe
